overview: From 2025-03-01 to 2025-04-01, elizaos/eliza had 322 new PRs (239 merged), 64 new issues, and 138 active contributors.

completedItems.title: docs: fix typo in Thai text for file path
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?

I noticed a typo in the Thai text, where "ไฟลได้ที่" was used, which isn't the standard way to write it. It should be "ไฟล์ที่ได้" to be grammatically correct. This update corrects that typo.

p.s. i'm native

completedItems.title: fix: Fixed missing comma between regex expressions
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?

Fixed a missing comma between regex expressions, which caused a syntax error. Now they are properly separated:

```python
r'^## (New Features.*?)$',
r'^## (New Fixes.*?)$',
r'^## (New Contributors.*?)$'
```

completedItems.title: fix: Fixed issue with async handling in getTweets method
completedItems.body:
# What does this PR do?  
This change fixes an issue where the `getTweets` method was not awaited, causing potential issues with handling the returned promise. The method is asynchronous, so I added `await` to properly wait for the promise
